bwwExcerpt: One can quibble about many other things in this production - can anyone adequately explain the meaning of set designer Scott Pask's final image - but there's no question that '1776' speaks loudly and clearly to audiences in 2022.

keyPhrases.quote: there's no question that '1776' speaks loudly and clearly to audiences in 2022.
